DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Three Influenza Vaccines Adults Ages 18 Older
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female age 18 year old . 2 . Individuals give write informed consent , comply study procedure , available followup . 1 . Individuals recently vaccinate influenza 2 . Subjects contraindication receive influenza vaccine 3 . Please contact site additional eligibility criterion
